home.observation: DoctorCard image in Hero section lacked 'sizes' attribute despite having 'priority'. This can lead to suboptimal image resource selection by the browser.

general.observation: Shared JS bundle is ~103kB, which is relatively high. Hypertune is lazy-loaded to mitigate this.

changes.description: Added sizes='128px' to Image component to assist browser in resource selection for LCP optimization.

verification.result: sizes attribute verified as '128px'. Visual appearance unchanged.
